law.text: The department may conduct any investigation, inquiry, or hearing that it may deem proper in connection with the performance of its duties under this chapter with respect to motor carriers. The investigation and inquiry may be conducted by or before the commissioner or any of his assistants or any representative of the department designated by the commissioner. Any hearing shall be conducted in accordance with KRS 281.640.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 25, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 206, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 42, effective June 15, 1950.
